text:
@AliVelshi In addition to Dem govenor INCOMPETENCE, the body count for Covid-19 includes, influenza, pneumonia, cancer, etc...

Dem governors think it will fool the American people & help excuse them for locking down America to INTENTIONALLY kill the economy.

It isn't working.
#tyranny
